entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
